Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've seen lots of craft where landing legs are used as pistons to open built cargo bays and cockpits. is there a tutorial on this?

this is an example:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104608-Reapers-Dutch-Designs-%28the-hollow-craft-serie-s%29-the-hollow-dropship-is-uploaded (The hollow crafts.)

How do you do it?

Edited January 3, 2015 by kerbingamer376

He used landing legs to push the door open. It's a bit cheaty because the door should break off.

A better non-stock way is Infernal Robotics which add pistons and hinges.
You can actually use fuel lines as a sort of hacky stock hinge. I don't recommend it, but you can do it
